products.title: Plum kurta set with embroidered nehru jacket
products.description: The plum nehru jacket in raw silk base features embroidery all over. It is paired with matching chanderi silk kurta and black cotton silk pants.

products.title: Nude crystal embellished top and skirt set
products.description: The oriana attire in nude shade comes with crystal embellished net base and features a high neck top crafted with polished crystal drops; paired with ruched skirt. It also includes a long thumb cut out gloves. This set consists of 3 components. Also available in other colors.

products.title: Black zig zag tuxedo suit set
products.description: This suit features a black blazer with silver zig-zag detailing in wrinkle free Italian fabric. Paired with matching cigarette pants.

products.title: Tri color silk bandhgala
products.description: This bandhgala in silk base features blocks in three different colors giving a very trendy look. It contains only one piece.

products.title: Silver bundi
products.description: eaturing metallic silver bundi in hand-textured lampi base. This is a single piece.

products.title: Grey and mauve embroidered lehenga set
products.description: Featuring a grey and mauve embellished lehenga in raw silk base with pearl and thread work. It is paired with embroidered blouse with net trail attached. This set is also available in other colors.

products.title: Mustard black cotton blazer
products.description: Featuring mustard blazer in cotton base with subtle detailing in black colour. This contains only one piece.

products.title: Grey embroidered sherwani set
products.description: The chanderi silk grey sherwani comes with hand embroidered golden acrylic khidki motifs and embellished with white cutdana. It is paired with matching kurta and pant pajama. This set is also available in other colors.

products.title: Midnight blue blazer and pant set
products.description: The taliesin blazer set features a midnight blue crystal embellished blazer in lycra; paired with matching wide-leg pants. This set consists of 2 components. It is also available in other colors.

products.title: Onion pink embroidered jawahar jacket set
products.description: This onion pink jawahar jacket in raw silk features hand embroidered peacock and floral moti green work. Paired with matching silk kurta and white pants.

products.title: Blush pink embroidered co-ord set
products.description: The blush pink asymmetric shirt in chanderi base comes with antique sequins and beadwork. It is paired with matching satin flared pants and a slip.

products.title: White striped pure linen shirt kurta
products.description: Featuring a white striped pure linen kurta shirt with cross panel detail. This product contains only one piece.

products.title: Deep ivory sequined kaftan with shorts
products.description: The sequined kaftan in georgette base comes with a separate dori belt. It is paired with glace cotton shorts and comes with a rayon slip.

products.title: Beige green linen printed shirt
products.description: Features a beige green printed shirt in linen base. This contains only one piece.

products.title: Mustard and olive ombre summer silk embroidered lehenga set with cape
products.description: The mustard and olive ombre lehenga in summer silk base comes with floral print and 3D sequins embroidery. It is paired with a matching printed blouse and a georgette embroidered cape having metal coin details. This set is also available in other colors.

products.title: Green cotton shirt with geometric pattern
products.description: Features a green shirt in cotton base with geometric pattern. This contains only one piece.

products.title: Olive green crinkled silk lehenga set
products.description: The olive green lehenga in crinkled silk base features mirror work. It is paired with a matching blouse having mirror work and a contrasting organza hand embroidered dupatta having gold fringe detailing. This set is also available in other color.

products.title: Mustard embellished A-line kurta set
products.description: The mustard A-line kurta in chanderi base comes with cutdana and sequin work. It is paired with matching glace cotton lace hem pants, a georgette dupatta and a rayon slip. This set consists of 4 components. This product is also available in sage green color.

products.title: Sage green embroidered saree set
products.description: The sage green saree in semi-sheer georgette base comes with pink beaded buttas and contrasting lace. It is paired with a contrasting hot pink unstitched blouse having beadwork.

products.title: Red embroidered kurta set-Kurta
products.description: Features red kurta in chanderi tissue silk comes with mirror work and ghungroo detailing at the yoke. It contains only one piece. This product is also available in other colors.

products.title: Emerald green kaftan set
products.description: This kaftan in pure crepe with a custom print base embellished with geometric sequin and mirror hand embroidery in front and back; paired with crepe wide pants. It comes with a slip. This set contains 3 pieces.

products.title: Light blue embroidered bandi with kurta set
products.description: This light blue bandi in silk base features overlapped panel with floral embroidery detail. It is paired with straight kurta in tencel and matching dhoti pants. This set is also available in other colors.

saris_sets.title: Pink pre-draped saree set

lehenga_sets.title: Mustard antique work lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: The mustard lehenga in chanderi base features hand embroidered antique sequins work; paired with matching front open cupped blouse and a georgette dupatta finished with fringes.

lehenga_sets.title: Egyptian print lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: The cobalt blue lehenga in viscose muslin and chanderi base comes with egyptian print and sequins highlights. It is paired with a matching blouse having applique work and a georgette scalloped lace dupatta.

lehenga_sets.title: Olive flat chiffon printed and embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: The olive gathered lehenga in flat chiffon base comes with leaf motif print, sequins and cutdana hand embroidery. It is paired with a matching micro-pleated bralette and a dupatta having hand embroidery. This set is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Peach and mint lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: This peach and mint panelled lehenga in linen base is bordered with gold lampi, khadi and kiran. It is paired with textured gold blouse in lampi base and gota patti silk organza dupatta highlighted with zari and edged with fine kiran. This set consists of three pieces. It is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Aqua blue georgette hand-embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: Features an aqua blue lehenga in georgette base with foil, block print, kalis and hand-embroidered geometric sequins. It is paired with a matching blouse with matte and glossy sequins and a dupatta.

lehenga_sets.title: Peach embellished lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: Featuring a peach godet skirt with sequence and cutdana embellished on raw silk base. It is paired with full sleeves blouse in raw silk with organza ruffle dupatta. This set is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Blue embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: The set comes with a cobalt blue lehenga in georgette base adorned with floral prints and embroidery detailing; paired with matching draped blouse in crepe silk base featuring light embroidery. It is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Peach lucknowi lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: Featuring a peach lehenga in lucknowi base. It is paired with a matching blouse and a stole having sequins embroidery.

lehenga_sets.title: Ivory and gold hand-embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: Features an ivory and gold lehenga in georgette base with foil, block print, kalis and geometric sequins hand embroidery. It is paired with a matching blouse with matte and glossy sequins and an ombre dupatta with a broad foil border.

lehenga_sets.title: Grey embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: Featuring a grey lehenga in raw silk base with pearl and sequin embellished. It is paired with an embroidered blouse with attached tulle cape sleeves and drape net. This set is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Lehenga blouse set with embellished kori dupatta
lehenga_sets.description: This yellow light gold lehenga in raw silk features floral print and embroidered details. It is paired with a matching embroidered blouse and embellished dupatta with kori. This set is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Maroon printed lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: This maroon lehenga in georgette base features floral and Moroccan print. It is paired with a matching choker dupatta and a bustier having hand embroidery.

lehenga_sets.title: Sapphire lehenga with bralette
lehenga_sets.description: This set features a sapphire blue lehenga in crepe base. It is paired with a matching bralette blouse in crepe. The product is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Off-white embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: This off white boat neck sleeveless blouse in dupion silk features pita dabka zardozi work. It is paired with brocade chanderi, silver stripes cotton silk base and bordered lehenga, along with gota edging chinon dupatta. This set is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Enchanted tales lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: This raw silk lehenga with pocket on the right side features thread work and sequin highlights. It is paired with an embroidered raw silk blouse and a diagonally embroidered tulle dupatta. This product is also available in other colors.

lehenga_sets.title: Cherry red silk embroidered lehenga set
lehenga_sets.description: This lehenga set features cherry red silk dori-sequins embroidered V-neck blouse. Paired with a cherry red silk high-waisted lehenga skirt with heavy Banarasi zari woven and embroidered border. It comes with cherry red-saffron silk organza patchwork embroidered dupatta.

dresses.title: Lavender chanderi embroidered jacket dress with belt
dresses.description: The lavender shawl collar trench style front open dress in chanderi base features floral zardozi work. It is paired with an embroidered belt and a rayon slip.

dresses.title: Mustard antique work tiered dress
dresses.description: The broad yoke tiered dress in chanderi base comes with side strings and features embellished antique sequins work. It comes with a rayon slip.

dresses.title: Black embellished cutout gown
dresses.description: This black embellished cutout gown comes in net base with deep neck and elongated sleeves. It is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Blush pink turtleneck dress
dresses.description: The blush pink turtleneck dress in chanderi base features floral embroidered sleeves. It comes with a lace hem rayon slip.

dresses.title: Blush pink embellished gown
dresses.description: Featuring a blush pink bead and sequin embellished gown with cutdana on rawsilk with overlap yoke and cutout at waist. It comes with detachable ruffle net capes on both sides. This set is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Aqua blue embroidered kaftan
dresses.description: This aqua blue kaftan in chiffon base features floral print and zardozi work detailing. It is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Black satin slip dress
dresses.description: Featuring a black slip dress in satin base with cowl neck and drawstring on left side. The product is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Beige embroidered dress
dresses.description: Featuring a beige midi length dress in linen base with colored thread embroidery in floral motifs. This product is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Indigo floral butti kaftan
dresses.description: The Indigo floral butti hand block printed V-neck kaftan in georgette features resham embroidered waist tab in the front to secure the pleats. It has potli buttons detailing at the neckline and hem of the sleeves. This product is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Multicolor cut out printed dress
dresses.description: Featuring a multicolor halter neck ruched dress that showcases an asymmetrical hem and tassel embellishments. It has a crepe silk base.

dresses.title: Green ruffle gown
dresses.description: Featuring an emerald green draped tube gown with a thigh-high slit and ruffle embellishments in crepe silk base. This product is also available in other color options.

dresses.title: Mauve high low dress
dresses.description: Featuring a mauve high low dress that comes with back tie-ups and braid detailing. This product is also available in other color options.

dresses.title: Black slip dress with cutout back
dresses.description: Featuring a black and white, tie and dye slip dress made in crepe silk. It comes with a tie-up details. The product is also available in other color options.

dresses.title: Wine sequin slip dress
dresses.description: Featuring a wine slip dress with sequin embellishment. It has a deep back and a V-neck. The product is also available in other colors.

dresses.title: Blue printed bodysuit with chiffon wrap
dresses.description: Featuring a blue and pink geometric printed lycra bodysuit; paired with printed chiffon wrap.

sherwanis.title: Ink blue raw silk sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The ink blue sherwani in raw silk base features fine cord work. It is paired with contrasting off-white cotton silk churidar pants.

sherwanis.title: Peri crystal embellished sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The sherwani set features a peri crystal embellished lycra shirt inside; paired with matching open sherwani and pants. This set consists of 3 components. It is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Grey embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The chanderi silk grey sherwani comes with hand embroidered golden acrylic khidki motifs and embellished with white cutdana. It is paired with matching kurta and pant pajama. This set is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Pink embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The chanderi silk pink sherwani comes with golden acrylic elephants and khidki motifs; embellished with cutpipe. It is paired with matching kurta and pant pajama. This set is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Dusty pink quilted sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The cotton silk sherwani in dusty pink silk threads comes with handquilted work. It is paired with matching pink kurta and churidar pants. This set is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Powder blue embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The chanderi silk sherwani in powder blue comes with hand embroidered golden acrylic lotus motifs and embellished with pearls. It is paired with matching kurta and pant pajama. This set is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Ivory palm tree embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: The chanderi silk sherwani in ivory comes with hand embroidered golden acrylic palm tree motifs and embellished pearl and sequins work. It is paired with a matching kurta and a pant pajama. This set is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Peri sherwani
sherwanis.description: This purple sherwani in chanderi silk base is embroidered with gota patti. It is paired with a purple salwar in silk chanderi. This set consists of two pieces. This product is also available in other colors.

sherwanis.title: Green and pink sherwani set
sherwanis.description: This green and pastel pink sherwani in linen base embroidered with gota patti. It is paired with a sheer organza kurta, cotton lycra pants and pastel pink organza stole embellished with gota patti border. This set consists of four pieces. This product is also available in other colors

sherwanis.title: Gold sherwani set
sherwanis.description: Gold textured sherwani in silk organza base, lined with khadi cotton mul fabric. It is paired with gold striped lycra pants. This set consists of two pieces

sherwanis.title: Beige embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: This set features beige chanderi silk sherwani with intricate thread work and embroidered floral motifs. It is paired with white silk pants.

sherwanis.title: White chanderi silk sherwani set
sherwanis.description: This set features white chanderi silk sherwani, pajama and a matching dupatta with full coverage thread work and embroidered floral motifs.

sherwanis.title: Powder blue chanderi silk sherwani set
sherwanis.description: This set features powder blue chanderi silk sherwani paired with white pajama and a beige dupatta. It is embellished with thread work and embroidered floral motifs.

sherwanis.title: Beige embroidered sherwani set with dupatta
sherwanis.description: This set features beige chanderi silk sherwani with heavy thread work embroidery all over. Paired with a matching embroidered dupatta and white silk pants.

sherwanis.title: Onion pink embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: This set features onion pink chanderi silk sherwani with intricate thread work and embroidered floral motifs. Paired with matching dupatta and white silk pants.

sherwanis.title: Gold embroidered sherwani set
sherwanis.description: This set features gold chanderi silk sherwani with threadwork and embroidered floral motifs. Paired with matching dupatta and white silk pants.
